casebody.data:
IN RE: J.H, Z.R., A.R., and D.R. 172A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 8, 2019

Sydney J. Batch, Attorney at Law, Raleigh.

Theresa Boucher, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem.

Brandon Duckworth, Attorney Advocate /GAL.

*483The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of July 2019 by Respondent-Mother to Amend the Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of July 2019."
